40000500.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>질주</>를 사용하지 않으면\n나보다 빨리 갈 수 없을 걸?\n이동하면서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>여기를 눌러봐!</>
40000500.English_Text:
If you don't use <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sprint</>,
You can't go faster than me?
While moving, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Click here!</>
40000500.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>不使用冲刺</>,
你就不能比我快?
移动中<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>点击这里！</>

40000501.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>질주</> 중에 이걸 누르고 있으면,\n멋지게 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>활루</>할 수 있어!
40000501.English_Text:
If you hold this while <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>sprint</>,
you can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>run</> in a cool way. !

40000502.English_Text:
Hold on! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Are you wearing a weapon</>?
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Open your bag</> Look,
40000502.Chinese_Text:
等待！ <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>你有没有佩戴武器</>~?
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>打开包看看</>

40000503.Original_Text: 제가 드린 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>무기</>가 있을 거예요!\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>눌러서 장착</>하시면 돼요!
40000503.English_Text:
There should be a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>weapon</> that I gave you!
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>tap to equip</>!

40000504.Original_Text: 아 참! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>여기를 누르면</>\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>회복약</>을 자동으로 쓸 수 있으니, 꼭 기억해 주세요~!
40000504.English_Text:
Oh true! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Click here</>
 to automatically use <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>HP Potion</> Please remember it!
40000504.Chinese_Text:
哦！ <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>点击这里可以自动使用</>
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>恢复</>,请记住！

40000507.English_Text:
Would you like to add an item to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Quickslot?</>
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Click here</> to do it!
40000507.Chinese_Text:
您想通过单击此处在
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 快速插槽 </> 中注册吗?

40000508.English_Text:
Then <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Swipe down</>,
 For <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Auto use</> 
Please use it often!
40000508.Chinese_Text:
然后,当<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>下来时,它会被用作</>,
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>自动</>~
请经常使用！

40000509.Original_Text: 아! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>자동으로 이동</>하려면,\n여길 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>누르면</> 되는 거 알지?\n자, 이제 가볼까?
40000509.English_Text:
Ah! To <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>automatically move</>,
you know that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>click</> here, right?
 Now, shall we go?
40000509.Chinese_Text:
啊! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>如果要自动移动</>,
这里<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>按</>,你知道吗?
好的,我们现在走吧?

40000510.English_Text:
(Come on, let's get rid of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burners</>
Let's save the pugs!)
40000510.Chinese_Text:
(来吧,让我们摆脱<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bull-morts</>,拯救
巴尔巴利！)

40000511.Original_Text: (이제 몸이 좀 풀린 것 같다.\n참, 잊지 말고\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>보상</>도 챙겨야지)
40000511.English_Text:
(I feel a bit relaxed now.
Oh, don't forget
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>You should also get a reward</>)
40000511.Chinese_Text:
(我觉得我的身体现在轻松了一些.
真的,不要忘记
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>奖励</>.)

40000512.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>영신단</>을 먹었으니\n더 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>빠르게 공격</>할 수 있겠어.\n자, 몸을 풀어볼까?)
40000512.English_Text:
(<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>You ate the Youngshindan</>
You can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>attack faster</> Sure.
Now, shall we unwind?)
40000512.Chinese_Text:
(吃完<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>永心丹</>后,可以
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>更快地攻击</>.
现在,我们可以放松一下吗?)

40000517.Original_Text: 마침 내리막길이 있네.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>질주</> 중에 이걸 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>누르고 있으면</>, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>활루</>할 수 있어.
40000517.English_Text:
There is a downhill road.
If you hold down <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>slipping</> during <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>sprint</> you can do it.

40000518.English_Text:
Would you like to start <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>click here</>
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>run</> here first?
40000518.Chinese_Text:
我们要不要先点击这里开始
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> sprint </>?

40000521.English_Text:
(<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>The pug</> is ok?
I'll have a look)
